thread.title: UCT students occupy Bremner building
thread.title_full: UCT students occupy Bremner building | News24

author: news24.com
title: UCT students occupy Bremner building
text:
Cape Town â€“ Protesting students at UCT barricaded entrances to the university on Monday over a proposed increase in study fees and the outsourcing of workers.
Police officials taped the roads off and directed traffic away but many chose to park on the side of the road or M3 highway and walk.
Protesters, who were linked to the Rhodes Must Fall campaign, did not stop persistent students and staff from entering on foot but asked them to walk around the barricade.
Seen on balcony
